import { FormControl, MenuItem, Select } from '@mui/base' import { InputLabel, TextField } from '@mui/material' import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from './employeeForm.module.scss' const EmployeeForm = () => { const cities = ['delhi', 'mumbai', 'banglore', 'kolkata', 'pune']; const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ fullName: "", email: "", contact: "", city: "", skill: "", gender: "" }); const handleChange = (key, value) => { setUserData((prevValue) => ({...prevValue, [key]: value})); } return (
Select City
) } export default EmployeeForm
